verbs.description: [V: pitcher] rich hill responds to donald trump criticism of dodgers in world series dodgers pitcher rich hill has responded to president donald trump tweet saturday which criticized dodgers manager dave roberts for taking hill out of game 4 of the world series dodgers dave roberts los angeles dodgers dave roberts outfielder donald trump rich hill red sox president dianne de guzman world series
